data.title: Population Statistics, Maps, Charts, Weather and Web Information

Home → Africa

Equatorial Guinea

Republic of Equatorial Guinea

Provinces

The population of the provinces of Equatorial Guinea by census years.

The area around Ciudad de la Paz forms the new Djibloho province (452.5 km²).

Contents: Cities & Localities

The population of all Equatorial Guinean cities and localities with more than 5,000 inhabitants according to census results.

Ciudad de la Paz (formerly Oyala) is currently being built to be the future capital of Equatorial Guinea.

2001 and 2015 figures refer to the urban population of municipalities; they may summarize the population of several localities. In 2017, 65 urban districts were established on municipal level.

(2001) Instituto Nacional de Estadisticas de Guinea Ecuatorial (web).

(2015) Rough calculation by »City Population« using 2001 and 2015 census figures.
